# HKMetadataKeyElevationAscended

**Global Variable**

A key that indicates the cumulative elevation ascended during a workout.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyElevationAscended: String
```

## Discussion

Set this key on  a workout, workout segment, or a quantity sample that represents distance. Set its value to an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] object with a length unit.

HealthKit assigns this metadata key to the segments it automatically creates for [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutActivityType/downhillSkiing] and [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutActivityType/snowboarding] workout sessions (Apple Watch Series 3 only).

## Skiing and Snowboarding

- **HKMetadataKeyAlpineSlopeGrade**: A key that indicates the percent slope of a ski run.
- **HKMetadataKeyElevationDescended**: A key that indicates the cumulative elevation descended during a workout.
